topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b24ad63687204e3311000#post_549b24ad63687204e3311000
Why do people like HXH?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b24d96368725ec7830a00#post_549b24d96368725ec7830a00
Well, the same thing why people likes DBZ, Jojo, One Piece.
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body: And double post mentlegent
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b254e6368722234000600#post_549b254e6368722234000600
No see that's thing. DBZ had fun if simple action scenes.
Jojo has intersting fights that lie in the mysterious abilities of Stands.
One Piece has fun and interesting characters and a fleshed out world that changes around the characters.
HXH has none of that. It's poorly written, poorly paced, and in a lot of cases poorly drawn.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b26e56368720702e50f00#post_549b26e56368720702e50f00
Oh god I knoooooooooow. It sucks.


"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b26e663687204e3861000#post_549b26e663687204e3861000
A perfect example of the pacing. Togashi spends an entire TWENTY CHAPTERS dedicated to Gon and Killua preparing to buy a video game at an auction. TWENTY FREAKING CHAPTERS about the ins and outs of bidding, knowing when to bid, when not to bid, how much to bid, and the like And when the time comes for the pay-off for the arc, they just buy the game. In ONE CHAPTER! Twenty chapters of build-up for one of the worst finishes I've ever read in a manga.

That's what it makes it interesting. Every arc is filled with twists and turns and has something uniquely good to it. Well, some arcs like the Chimera ant were weird, but hey, there is no such thing as perfection and even with these flaws, I still consider it one of the best series Iâ€™ve ever seen.
